s.text: Do what you're good at (kind of like the way the Markoe family dogs focus their energies on eating food).

As we used to say in the third grade, back when I was wearing Keds for Kids and a Star Wars T-shirt and sobbing on the playground because the other kids were all pelting me with dodge balls, "well, ah- doy.

Again, hardly a brilliant observation on my part, but then again, how smart do you really need to be to get the general gist of this sort of thing?
Again, hardly a brilliant observation on my part, but then again, how smart do you really need to be to get the general gist of this sort of thing?
Lesbians in particular, from what I've observed, seem to have a particular knack for it (staying married, I mean, not enduring ocean-liner dream vacations).
